channel.title: Shorten client so people can download and only use it
channel.description: hey guys.i was wondering if use could help me out.i wanna upload my client to mediafire so people can download to play the server but i wanna hide some files so they can not change the ip.

item.title: Shorten client so people can download and only use it
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

topgun6792:

hey guys.i was wondering if use could help me out.i wanna upload my client to mediafire so people can download to play the server but i wanna hide some files so they can not change the ip.

make a copy of your client (so you can still edit it later)
and on the other client, delete all the .java files.
after youve done that, select all your .class files, right click and choose properties, under attributes, set the files to hidden.

If you want to go more advanced, you can try jarring your client and then converting it to .exe (this makes it a little harder to be stolen and stops your average noob in his tracks)

Read full topic
item.source: Shorten client so people can download and only use it
